website_summaries.verdict: GoWISE makes air frying a cinch, thanks to 8 presets for popular foods, a "shake" reminder and cooking timer.
pros: Advanced touchscreen with presets for many popular fried foods
Start/stop button changes time and temperature mid cook cycle
Alarm function reminds you when to shake
Temperature ranges from 180 to 400 degrees Fahrenheit
Includes non-stick, FDA certified and PFOA-free pan and detachable basket with cool touch handle
May take some practice to figure out frying times
cons: To help prevent the fryer coating from peeling, do not use with cooking spray or clean while still warm

website_summaries.verdict: This air fryer allows you to fry, bake, grill, and roast with little to no oil. Ideal for families of four or more.
pros: Very sleek look with advanced touch screen menu
Programmed with eight cooking presets for ease of use
Equipped with a wide temperature range from 180F to 400F in 10 degree increments
Comes with non-stick FDA-certified and PFOA-free pan and detachable basket
Recipe book helps assist with dinner ideas
cons: Some users reported issues with the basket and the machine not functioning as indicated

website_summaries.verdict: Deep fryer that provides a healthier way to cook.
pros: Comes programmed with eight pre-sets for cooking everything from fried chicken to baked cakes
Little to no oil is necessary

customer_reviews.title: Great airfryer if you are smart enough to follow directions
customer_reviews.text: We love this airfryer. Obviously with all of these fryers you are supposed to use liners, that keeps the non stick from peeling off. I wouldn't take a review from anyone who doesn't follow simple directions and use liners seriously. Use liners, rinse out after every use, do not scrub, and it will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Hackney

customer_reviews.title: The cooking results have been great. But the first 2 times we used it
customer_reviews.text: The cooking results have been great. But the first 2 times we used it, we heard a loud pop and discovered a hairline crack in our quartz kitchen countertops. We now use it on top of a large wood butcher block cutting board. No issues since. Banana bread, chicken thighs, fish & French fries have all been amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Smith

customer_reviews.title: STAYY AWAY! DONT BUYYY!
customer_reviews.text: It works as is supposed to, although after a few uses the black surface started chipping. Everything i cook, i only get half of it, the other half just stays on the tray and i cannot remove. Very dissapointed UPDATE: the chipping is NOTHING, now is all rusted. THIS IS NOT SAVE! DONT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Raymondtahhan

customer_reviews.title: Please Read!  Safety Issues!
customer_reviews.text: This product is dangerous. The bottom tray will detach and fall to the floor after a few uses (6 in my case). My daughter wanted to run and help pick it up, it would have seriously burned her. It burned my carpet and dumped its contents all over. Do NOT buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy P. Eck

customer_reviews.title: failed first use
customer_reviews.text: Day one, we got it out and made a handful of tater tots to test it... and the bottom pan fell off the basket onto the floor, burning the tile and nearly causing injury. Boxed it up as soon as it cooled and returned it. The tater tots were good... but the clip that holds the bottom pan onto the basket only works when it is cool. When it's hot, the plastic clip doesn't hold and the pan falls off.,. basically defeating the purpose of hot air frying.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia G. Mordan

customer_reviews.title: garbage product...avoid
customer_reviews.text: Buy another fryer. Ours is less than 90 days old and used maybe a dozen times. When you pick up the basket by the handle, the basket it comes right out of the outer basket. A very dangerous situation with hot food. I looked at the warranty and only 30 days on the basket. What a piece of garbage. They obviously know there are issues with the design. I wish I would have seen this first. I hope helps others avoid a similar experience. Maybe a class action lawsuit in their future.
customer_reviews.author: C. Gilstrap

customer_reviews.title: I am in dilemma!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this machine. It is very easy to use and clean up. So, I have recommended it to my friends. Most of my friends bought the same air Fryer as mine. However after 3 months of light use, the nonstick coating on the food basket flakes off. Additionally, the locking mechanism that fold the drawer and the basket together were broken resulting the drawer cannot be closed. I also use Air Fryer Besego 9 inch Bamboo steamer Liners everytime. I am in dilemma whether to buy another brand of air fryer and abandon my $97.60(+tax) GoWISE USA 5.8-QT Digital Air Fryer or fix it with new parts.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: You can clearly see the silver on the base.. I cleaned it with a SPONGE only@
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed with this buy! It’s very loud and there is no chicken making option but I ignored that because it was serving its purpose of making low-calorie food. Today, I was cleaning the air fryer, only using a SPONGE and the base started falling apart! I’m scared to rub it anymore, as everything might come off. If it wasn’t so high priced, I would have ignored but when you are paying so much you should get a high-quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Aleem

customer_reviews.title: YOU HAVE TO BUY ONE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: BEST BEST BEST item ever!! I can't believe how much I love this kitchen counter top appliance. I use this on average once a day, maybe more. It cooks beautiful and you can pretty much put anything in there. Chicken, french fries, steak, roast, you name it; and all without the grease. You can even cook hot dogs; not the most healthy but they come out like you cooked them on the grill. Reheating food comes out much better in this air fryer than in a microwave. The microwave either overcooks or makes things soggy and the food just never tastes the same but not in the air fryer!! The food comes out great! Gotta try it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Item doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this air fryer based on all the positive reviews but it’s a bad quality product! I was really excited when It arrived and wanted to fry some chicken wing but the air fryer and its LCD screen did not turn on at all. And last thins the plastic smells bad and it is cheap. Overall I will never by this brand again and would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: satichannel

customer_reviews.title: Only problem I do have like many others is the nonstick material is starting to ...
customer_reviews.text: Had it now for a few months and everything electronically works well. Only problem I do have like many others is the nonstick material is starting to come off in the pan even though I only use a SPONGE and dishsoap to clean it. I wish there is some sort of replacement since I am pass the 30 day or something because I can foresee the nonstick material completely coming off in another 3 months which then makes this useless and only good for half year usage for the price.
customer_reviews.author: 997c2s

customer_reviews.title: Use it almost daily
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this air fryer. If your food doesn’t come of crispy and tender, your doing it wrong, don’t over fill the basket, cook in single layers and flip or shake halfway through. The family loves whole chickens the best. The skin is nice and crispy but the meat is as tender and juicy as a rotisserie. Battered wings a nice and crispy, and I’ll never microwave pizza rolls or hot pockets again. Clean up is very easy. Virtually nothing ever sticks to it. Take your time. Read the instructions, and use it the way they tell you to.
customer_reviews.author: T.Kels

customer_reviews.title: Broke in <6 Months
customer_reviews.text: This air fryer was great. It was a healthy alternative to frying and worked beautifully. We used it fairly often, but less than 6 months after purchasing it just stopped in the middle of cooking. Everything was working great and all of a sudden the fans stopped working. Looked inside, everything was clean, nothing was blocking the fans. Just quit on us. Very disappointed in the life of this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Zackary Kimble Fronk

customer_reviews.title: We ordered 2 and neither would even turn on.
customer_reviews.text: We saw it was an Amazon favorite, so we ordered one. It didn't turn on. We googled and youtubed it to make sure we weren't being idiots, and nothing worked. We know this stuff happens with appliances and figured it was an isolated indecent, so we ordered one for Grandma's Birthday....and her's didn't work either. Same thing, but her digital screen turned on for a short second before going black. Maybe we just have bad luck! We returned ours and bought a Phillips brand air fryer for ourselves and Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 'Start' isn't intuitive but it still functions great
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about the quality because I'd never heard of GoWise before, but I'm very pleased with this purchase. The buttons on the screen don't work like the instructions say that they should, and you'd think that if you press the 'Start/Play' icon then your food will start cooking. Nope! The start button doesn't do anything but reset my settings, the power button is what actually starts the cooking. Once I got used to how the buttons actually function vs. how they should function, it's worked like a charm and I've been happy ever since!
customer_reviews.author: Kori Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great concept but this machine is VERY POORLY MADE!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for Christmas for my husband. So, I have only had it for less than 4 months . This has literally fallen apart. Completely! The front plastic came completely off, and then the handle of the inside fryer part came completely apart. I really liked it until then, although it is also difficult to clean. I have since purchased a completely different fryer. I would not waste my money on this fryer.
customer_reviews.author: amber patronite

customer_reviews.title: E1
customer_reviews.text: I was overly impressed with the ascetics of this product. It is very well put together and keeps your kitchen looking updates, while also providing you the opportunity to cook healthier. The only reason I am giving this a one is because the first time that I attempted using this machine, it cooked a half a batch of fries, for half the time, following an ERROR CODE message E1. I am now unable to use this machine and attempting to contact "support" has lead to several minutes of waiting for a technician and no response.
customer_reviews.author: Vannah

customer_reviews.title: Best thing since my Instant Pot
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase since my Instant Pot. All we’ve done is fast food but what a difference! I have an 80 year old stove, double ovens. Love the six burners but the oven door gets hot. Can’t cook with grand babies around. This is like having another, much safer oven. I can’t believe I’ve ever heard of these before! GOWISE rated #2 in consumer reports, about $150 less than Phillips. I don’t know why Phillips is so much more, but for a first time buyer $58 was a steal. Thank you to all reviewers and those who answered my question. Taking time to do that is a great help.
customer_reviews.author: Katka

customer_reviews.title: Quick Cooking
customer_reviews.text: I just got our air fryer yesterday and used it last night for dinner. I made boneless spare ribs and they were good but I think I cooked them a little too long. It is fast and easy and I can't wait to try other things in it. The only reason I didn't give it five stars is that it is a little confusing to determine how long to cook things in it. I'm sure I will get the hang of it but it would have been nice to have some kind of weight chart for meats and such. I would recommend getting a GoWISE air fryer to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Williams

customer_reviews.title: Deffective: Nonstick coating fails within a month
customer_reviews.text: I had this for about a month, no more. I had read reviews where the nonstick coating started flaking off so I was especially careful to clean the pans gently and the same way I carefully clean my other non-stick pans. There are now visible dots about the size of a pencil eraser where the nonstick coating has separated from the metal. I have returned it for a refund. In the future I will steer clear of this brand.
customer_reviews.author: nom de plum

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working 14 months after purchase
customer_reviews.text: Personally I loved this product. It cooked food really well. And made life really convenient. But it just died on me. No one wants to buy a product that dies after 1 year. And since I bought it the price went up $15. So I would not recommend anyone to buy this, simply because it does not last. I used this probably 3 times a week max. There's no reason why a product should die after such little use. And customer service just left me at “sorry warranty only lasts a year”. Please go buy a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Mariam M.

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you are on the fence about getting an air-firer, I can relate.. I have heard good and bad reviews but I finally decided I would have to try it myself. Hands down the best purchase of the year, I absolutely love my air firer!!! Frozen wing come out cooked perfect in no time, family sized thawed chicken breast cooked in 30min and juicy. Frozen french fries come out crisp like a restaurant firer.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny Robitaille

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, had to return it
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, had to return it. The drawer is difficult to slide in and out, half the time it doesn't fit. Black plastic near the top of the handle bulges out when drawer is closed, letting hot air escape. I should have known better than to go with an off brand. I went ahead and bought the newest digital Philips XXL and hope to have better luck with that one, which looks to have much better quality. There is a reason Gowise only warrants the drawer and related parts for 30 days. Poor quality, I would stay away from this one.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with this.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present for my daughter. She loves this Air Fryer. She uses it nearly every night now. She loves to cook chicken wings in it. They come out brown and very crispy - - - just the way she likes them. She cooked some tater-tots for me last night and they were so good. She didn't use any oil at all but they came out crisp on the outside and tender on the inside and they didn't taste like they had been baked in the oven. We both were tired of using a deep fryer or a deep pan to fry in. No more grease everywhere and no huge mess to clean up!
customer_reviews.author: JanisT

customer_reviews.title: Trouble shooting
customer_reviews.text: After four months had pan began to peel. Parchment papers were purchased for ease of cleaning but that didn't help. Then the digital screen started flashing and was Unable to rectify the problem. Went on line, nothing mentioned of this problem, called customer support, no answer. Isn't worth the trouble to use the warranty. Sad as I loved this unit. Even bought one for my friend. So far she hasn't had a problem. We'll see after four months how she feels then.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1 Year
customer_reviews.text: ORDER A DIFFERENT BRAND!! I have had this for 1.5 years with no problems until it decided to shut off randomly one day while in use. It completely stopped working and when I tried to contact customer service they were unable to do anything for me. I am so disappointed with the customer service as well as the unreliability of the product. I would not feel confident buying this again myself or recommending it to someone else. I expect my appliance that I take great care of to last for years!! Not under two. Very unimpressed and a total waste of money. BUY A DIFFERENT BRAND!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Wilfley

customer_reviews.title: Best buy of the year
customer_reviews.text: We were very skeptical, even after eating at friends. So glad we made the purchase! It takes a lot of space on the counter, but since we use it 4-5 times a week, it never goes away. The best part is that it will ‘bake’ and ‘fry’ so we hardly turn the oven on in the summer, and save fat and calories on our favorite fried foods. Coconut shrimp come out restaurant quality, and even French fries come out crispy and flavorful. We’ve had this for over 6 months, and still use it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett Flowers

customer_reviews.title: This frier is dangerous, should be taken off the market.
customer_reviews.text: Dont waste your money, cheap materials, dangerous equipment, you will get burn. As soon as you pull it off, the basket with hot grease from whatever you cooking, will fall off! It happened 3 times already, unfortunately is to late to return it, cannot believe Amazon is let them sell this product here. DANGEROUS.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Piacentini

customer_reviews.title: Fryer basket doesn’t stay locked
customer_reviews.text: This fryer with what it does with food was awesome ! There is 1 problem though - once the unit heats up it makes the plastic in the handle expand and the fryer basket will not stay locked making it dangerous when taking your food out . I googled it to see if others had the same issue and found a YouTube video with a fix . I tried it but unfortunately the basket only locks back once the handle is cool again. I had to return it . I will Do more research on a different model .
customer_reviews.author: Lorinda J

customer_reviews.title: Such a disappointment! and waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love it, but it's already broken. I purchased it on Feb 2018 and now its's Nov 2018. I only used it probably 10 times, and the touchscreen keeps beeping and it doesn't work! I never had an appliance that broke so quickly especially within such a short timeframe and with just occasional use.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I don't often review products, but I am so impressed with this product that I had to leave a review. I love to cook, but I have some health issues that make me have to minimize my fat intake considerably. That has caused me to have to cut out many fried foods. I got this cooker for Christmas and I have used it every single day since. I have done everything from Fried Chicken two apple slices and it delivers consistent results every time. Another huge bonus for me is that it is extremely easy to clean. If I like a product but it is difficult to clean I won't use it. This is definitely my new favorite cooking method.
customer_reviews.author: Roxane

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended (slight usage), however there is a very strong toxic/plastic smell which scares me from using it more.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this air fryer for a few month. However I have only used it twice because of the terrible plastic/toxic smell resulted from the usage. To a point I'm actually considering selling this thing on ebay and get a properly full metal air fryer, no matter how expensive it is.
customer_reviews.author: Bilson

customer_reviews.title: Buy with caution!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 4 of these, one for myself and then for my 3 adult children. I researched and read reviews, reports named it best for the buck. I loved mine and it’s still working HOWEVER in less than 1.5 years my son’s and daughter’s quit working!!! There is only a 1 year warranty on the product and that warranty is from manufacture date not purchase date. In my opinion even though it’s a great product, you have 50% chance of it not lasting and do you want to spend that much money for a year?! Buy with caution!!
customer_reviews.author: rhonda l breech

customer_reviews.title: bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: my basket pitted and after countless emails etc they are a pos to work with. returning mine as soon as I get back in town. Do not buy this. The basket will pit and only 30 days of warranty. bad customer service. buy another brand. plus timer only to 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our experience after 1 year!
customer_reviews.text: Really loved it. But after using it 3 to 4 times a week for 1 year and 3 months. It just quit in the middle of cooking chicken wings. We actually grew to use this more and more and got used to the benefit of the air fryer. No doubt, it’s heathlier and food does taste better. We will buy another one just not sure if it’s Go-Wise. One would believe it should last longer. But, we got what we paid for. And to those who talk about basket rust. We used the Go-Wise parchment paper didn’t have that issue.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Engert

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love my air fryer. I had to purchase accessories, such as a rack ( so I can cook layers of food), skewers and a cake pan that fit in this 5.8 quart air fryer. My cake came out moist and delicious. Comes with a cook book, but I had to modify the heat and timing for some food items. The cook book, at least, give a general idea of how long to cook something.
customer_reviews.author: dino alcini

customer_reviews.title: One of the best investments I’ve made
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been eating gluten and sugar free for about a year now, and i am legit mad at myself for not buying an air fryer sooner. It really helps save time with cooking which makes it easier to try and continue eating healthy. I’ve even gotten others in my household to start eating healthy just because of how great food comes out of it. Chicken especially! You can always get a nice crisp without drying out the chicken. Love it, just buy it . You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Makes good food
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. It's slowly replacing our toaster oven because this cooks most of the frozen foods we used to use the oven for. It makes you feel better about eating fried food when it's not coated in oil. We look forward to using the recipe book that comes with it to make a real meal. The only thing I'd say is cook times vary depending on how much oil you put in so sometimes the perfect time can be too much time the next time you cook the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Arkie

customer_reviews.title: It lasted just over a year before going dead
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fryer just before Christmas of 2017. I don't have many complaints about the unit. It was my first air fryer and the family used it often. With that said the unit died in Feb of 2019. There were simply no lights on the display panel. My thought on this is that things don't last forever. Would I recommend it? It's okay, just buy the extended warranty as I did. So I had to turn back to the oven for what I was about to cook that night. But I was able to get a payout for the failed unit. Ultimately I went with a different manufacturer for my replacement (also with an extended warranty).
customer_reviews.author: A. Outlaw

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed in this product the coating in the basket is ...
customer_reviews.text: Very Disappointed in this product the coating in the basket is already flaking off. the machine itself is great but what good is it if your ingesting the coating I was going to purchase one for my brother but I’ll look for a better product.....
customer_reviews.author: Jeff D

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! Makes crispy food fast
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used it a hand full of times so far but I’m super impressed! I saw some complaints about the coating chipping, again mine is new so I haven’t had that problem. My sister has had this same air fryer for years as well, uses it all the time, and has had no issues. It’s super easy to use, food is ready quick and crispy! If you’re really worried about coating chipping you can line the tray with parchment paper, though we haven’t found that necessary. Okay also this air fryer is huge! I was shocked by the size when it arrived. Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Caselli

customer_reviews.title: Blower stopped and can't return it.
customer_reviews.text: The blower quit working during the third month and only used 7 times. I called Gowise and they gave me a email address and told me to email the invoice, a picture of bottom of air fryer of the tag with serial number, and a video of the product running for 10 to 15 seconds and They would send a address to return it. They said the serial number was blurred and the video did not go through. I still can't get it to go through so I can't get an address to send it back. Most disappointing product I ever bought My advice, don't buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pami

customer_reviews.title: Nancy
customer_reviews.text: I was cooking batches of eggplant in my GoWise Air Fryer, during my use I noticed it cracked my granite counter top. The Air Fryer’s exhaust heat had heated my countertop enough to crack it. Since the incident I reviewed the manual. The list of “Safeguards” are 1 to 28. Well.. #28 says not to place air fryers directly on the countertop but to use a silicone pad. #2 on the safeguard list says to keep the packaging the air fryer came in. In my opinion cracking a granite countertop should be in the top 5 or on the cover of the box with a warning or beware! Very disappointed in the company reply to my incident.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: I had my air fryer for about 6 months before the bucket needed replaced. It completely fell apart, was chipping, and wouldn’t turn it on. They sent a replacement bucket. Well.. it’s officially a year and three months I have had my air fryer and it just DIED. Just shut off and stopped working in the middle of using it. My one year warranty was up and they offered me 20% off another one. No thanks.. I paid such a decent price for this for it to stop working after a year? nope!
customer_reviews.author: Cori

customer_reviews.title: It’s huge follow suggestions and It’s worth it
customer_reviews.text: So far soo good. I did get parchment paper to use. So clean up is better than my George foreman. It is a bit confusing trying to figure out what buttons to press maybe just me. lol but no issues with the drowse piece coming apart. However since reading the reviews. I am extremely mindful that the safety release is always in the correct position. Btw I kind of love this thing. I’m trying to cook everything in it!! Oh in case you are someone like me who hates appliances on your counter this thing is massive so I’ve had to change up my kitchen to feel better about it having a home on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Eb

customer_reviews.title: great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for christmas. I will say I look up recipes online for cooking times and temperatures however this product has preset buttons as well for more commonly fried foods. the basket is a good size, it is easy to remove from the basin which makes for easier plating and cleaning. I have made fresh and frozen french fries and both came out great. also done chicken tenders, pork chops, brussel sprouts, broccoli and jicama fries. Only been about a month but I would buy this again and would buy as a present.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great....BUT...
customer_reviews.text: Who thought it was a good idea to have an on button but no way to stop programming if you make a wrong selection? OR to have the power button also turn on a fixed program of cooking at 370 for 15 minutes? Even worse, the instructions say unplugging the unit is the only way to clear the programming which doesn't actually work. I think there's some residual charge that holds the programming because unplugging simply restarts the timer where it left off unless you wait for several minutes. So basically, it makes great food, but has no off button. Not exactly a genius move there, GoWise.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: DANGER. DANGER. DANGER.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the most dangerous product you can have in your kitchen. I have purchased three and the all suffer handles that inadvertently come apart and spill whatever is in the outer pan. If this happens to be hot grease, which it was in my case, it’s an awful mess to clean up. If your not wearing shoes it’s quite painful. It’s a very good thing that my pet dog wasn’t in the kitchen like he often is. It is a great cooker but you have to weigh the benefit against the danger. My units can be found in the garbage this week.
customer_reviews.author: CHARLES P DAGENET

customer_reviews.title: Worst product/company
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one and the first time I used it the airfryer caught on fire. It was the most scary thing. The company was very difficult but eventually they sent me a new one. I received my new air fryer and again the first time I was using it I heard a loud pop and looked and it cracked my counter top!!! This time the company is being even more difficult and wont give me my money back. I would never buy from GO WISE USA again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves this!
customer_reviews.text: He wanted one of these and we bought one first which had issues so he returned it to the store. So I decided to come check out Amazon as usually can find the perfect thing when regular shopping doesn't work well. This was a hit and he thinks it is the best thing ever. I am warming up to it yet he enjoys cooking more then I do and I enjoy the tasting and eating part. This one was perfect and is large enough so he can do smaller things or has a rack he can do a nice meal or even a whole chicken.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Error message right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: I can't review the effectiveness of the product because as soon as I turned it on it gave an electrical error message. My options are to either return to Amazon or go through GoWISE under their 1-year warranty. I believe I'll try to get a refund it at all possible. I'd recommend going with another brand. This is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waist of money.
customer_reviews.text: i Bought this product after reading the reviews thinking I would have something that would last for awhile and work decent.. this gave me an E1 code 5 months after.. then worked for a few more times and then complete shut down. Now all it gives me is E1. This product shouldn’t have shut down 5 months in. Spend the money on a better product. Not happy with this air fryer.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ward

customer_reviews.title: Glorified Oven
customer_reviews.text: Got for Christmas. Everything worked fine. Packaging fine. Tried it out on Christmas day. Raw chicken wings and frozen fries. Product is no more than a convection oven. Wings took 8 extra minutes to reach 170 degrees for a total of 30 minutes. Then was like baked chicken. Some browning, but not crisp. Fries were crunchy throughout but not crisp on the outside and hot & soft inside. I do better in the oven if I want baked goods. Not a replacement for a fryer. I'll stick with my 1 gallon fryer when I want fried food. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly agonis

customer_reviews.title: This thing is absolutely fantastic!! It cooks great.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best cooking appliances I have ever purchased! It works great. It fries everything up very nicely. We cook with it quite a bit now. We use it a few times a week. We get info about cooking things with it on YouTube which helps a lot. The price is worth it. It is quite large but I would not want it any smaller. You will love it and your spouse will cook more!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Bloody Crap just broke.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it in 2019. Just broke. Couldn't even last a rotten year. Daddys not happy or impressed.
customer_reviews.author: 2ed Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product design
customer_reviews.text: At first I loved this product UNTIL I had issues with the basket peeling and rusting causing potential health concerns. Their customer service is very strict on returning the product. I’d probably recommend researching more on the coating that’s on the basket/interior to ensure the brand you decide to purchase does NOT do this. Steer clear of this gowise air fryer for this particular reason.
customer_reviews.author: SellSaleSell

customer_reviews.title: Defective and Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: A few other users captured the same issue I have in their reviews. The fry basket and handle are the weak spots and can be very dangerous. The handle is held by four small screws that eventually will begin to pull out. When that happens the basket can become disengaged and you could have your HOT dinner on yourself.
customer_reviews.author: D. J. Burns

customer_reviews.title: This unit was just ok.
customer_reviews.text: This unit pooped out on us after a year and a half. I'm unsure of the lifespan for these units, but I'm going to try a different brand. Also the basket fell out when we were tossing the food, so I'm going to look for something more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: tummypoke

customer_reviews.title: Smokes and drips
customer_reviews.text: Our other air fryer died after several months, we thought this was a step up. Nope. It spews the fat and dripping from whatever you are cooking to the back of the unit (outside the drawer). This then drips out the back vent onto the counter. We also found that if we try to cook bacon in a pan like we used to, it spews the grease all inside the unit (outside the basket holder). Even following their exact bacon instructions resulted in smoking up the kitchen. Terribly made. Returning this defective junk.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Makes cooking easy, fun, and fast without a mess.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this air fryer. I was a little unsure about trying something new but I took the plunge and bought it anyway. I used the fryer last night to make salmon patties and they were delicious. I tested two before I made an entire batch and tweaked the second batch time a little to make them perfect. Can't wait to use again. I am disappointed with the delivery of this product. The driver left the box in the middle of the driveway in the pouring rain. My mother in law hit the box but did not run over it so there was no damage but still upset with the lack of care from the driver.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Moseley

customer_reviews.title: The iar fryer itself worked great. The fry basket broke the first time using ...
customer_reviews.text: The iar fryer itself worked great. The fry basket broke the first time using it. We returned this one and purchased another. Once again the fryer itself was great but on the first use the basket came apart. This was also returned and after talking with friends who had air fryers we went with the Nuwave fryer. If Gowise can get their manufacturing fixed this would be a great fryer. But for the cost I expect it to be in perfect working order after first use/
customer_reviews.author: M. Berry

customer_reviews.title: Not great.
customer_reviews.text: Its a very thin metal that doesn’t seem too sturdy. When you open and close you have to push it sometimes more then once to shut tight. I’m returning. It’s not free to return. You have to pay over 10.00 so look at reviews. Also they say if you don’t have a good reason for the return they will charge 15% restocking fee. There are other companies that will let you try and not charge if returned. Read, read, read before buying. Amazon is a great company normally but to have this as one of their suppliers is not good.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Love this appliance! I was skeptical about things coming out crispy or just soggy but this truly works the way it says it does! It’s also very easy to clean the inner basket and inside of the fryer. This makes eating healthy a little easier as chicken comes out juicy inside, and vegetables are great also! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Scott

customer_reviews.title: Greatest appliance in my kitchen.  Will never live without one again.
customer_reviews.text: This thing can cook ANYTHING! I put Ribeye steaks in this thing, with -0- oil added. NO OIL! Just season the steak with salt or whatever you want.. and in it goes. Straight from the freezer too. You can grab frozen steaks and put them in this thing, and they will come out great. My steaks and chicken come out juicy and soft, I can't believe this thing cooks so well, without any added oil or smoke.
customer_reviews.author: electrolyte

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Air Fryer!! SO versatile
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. Bought it on a whim and based it on friend recommendations and I am blown away. The 100 recipes it comes with are filled with absolute BANGERS. Love this and WELL worth the price. Much bigger than I anticipated but it's nice to have everything cooked at once and not in batches as compared to a smaller one.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It Sure Does Make Good Donuts
customer_reviews.text: For the value this air fryer that GoWISE has put out delivers! Nothing hard about the unboxing. Open, move some styrofoam, lift out, take off some plastic, plug in and party like its 1998 again! Make sure you preheat the air fryer before using give it about 4-6 min depending on temp and you are ready to go. Get some non stick foil and forget about the cooking spray. We made donuts first thing. Opened up a can of biscuits. Preheated to 370. Poked a hole in the dough and rounded. Placed in there for 8 min and BAM ready to go. Mixed up some cinnamon and sugar and drizzled with honey. #Murica
customer_reviews.author: Justice Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I really liked my Gowise (air fries really well) until the basket started peeling and flaking. It is difficult to get clean. And I don't use metal utensils in it or use aerosol sprays. Just oils. I have had it just over a year and I am already in the market for a new one with ceramic coating and not "non-stick."
customer_reviews.author: debs3052

customer_reviews.title: Amazing....not no more
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Fryer started out awesome. Now the basket won’t hold in place. Every time I take it out of the fryer the basket just drops off and falls on the floor. The patches on the button release must have quickly worn out or something. Very disappointed Great air fryer. Awesome alternative to a deep fryer. Anything chicken or potato always comes out great, best way to reheat pizza, and 100’s of other uses
customer_reviews.author: Michael Coletta

customer_reviews.title: GoWISE USA GW22731 1700-Watt 5.8-QT 8-in-1 Digital Air Fryer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased and have used the GoWISE USA GW22731 1700-Watt 5.8-QT 8-in-1 Digital Air Fryer many times for a little over a month, and I like it. I had another brand previously and was going to go with that because I knew how that one worked and because of the mixed reviews on this one, but decided to try. Glad I did. It’s larger than my other one and was nervous because of storage space. It fit into the space with a little rearranging. Good Unit. I think you’ll like it.
customer_reviews.author: Essence56

customer_reviews.title: We love it. Have had zero problems or issues
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had any of the issues or problems people report. Be careful, clean the basket and drawer thoroughly with hot water and a soapy sponge and leave both pieces to dry before you put it all back together. I use just a TINY sprinkle of grapeseed or peanut oil to toss or brush onto things and I get light, crispy, yummy fried flavor. We don’t use it all the time but we’ve made homemade fries, zucchini fritters, egg rolls, avocado rolls, fried wontons, tater tots and other frozen snacks. They’ve all turned out really well. I highly recommend this air fryer!
customer_reviews.author: Bronwyn Soell

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE- caused fire and destroyed my home
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT buy this product, I purchased this air fryer Took it out of the box, took all the tape and stuff off of it plugged it in NEVER turned it on. Went to change my clothes prior to cooking 5 min later my whole kitchen was in flames. The fire has displaced my whole family. Basically my whole home is a 100% loss from the fire! VERY DANGEROUS DO NOT PURCHASE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Whigham

customer_reviews.title: Save yourself time and money. Just get it a box store.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product as a gift. As soon as it arrived I wrapped it and put it in a secure location. The big day comes husband opens it and it has some serious nicks and what we thought was just comestic damage. I call Amazon. I'm past the return date and since it works they don't care. Well it sort of worked. Multiple calls to GoWise and even if I pay the fairly expensive return shipping most likely they won't replace because the warranty is very limited. Very disappointed in both GoWise and Amazon on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Shutterbug

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I've been watching this for a while. It's constantly rated the best for the price. I have to agree. It's easy to use. It comes with a nice cookbook and instructions. I tried it the first night and pretty much every day since. It cooks great! I made country style pork ribs and they were great! Chicken wings were perfect. Chicken thighs were crispy on the outside but juicy inside. Surprisingly as nice as advertised. I will be using this to make lots of meals.
customer_reviews.author: Tim H.

customer_reviews.title: Good product, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Just received the air Fryer. I still need to understand what's the best way to cook which aliment, but so far, i am really happy. This cooking method is really fast and you even don't need to worry about it. The air exist on the back of the machine is quite warm, so i would suggest not to put it against a wall or anything else that can be damageable. I just order more accessories to cook and arrange the food inside the initial basket. (I will try it tonight). If you want to do some food with some sauce, i would suggest to get the pan as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price great product
customer_reviews.text: Lasted about a year and I put this thing through hell. Used it at least 4 times a week and it was perfect. If you don’t stay on top of cleaning the unit grease gets baked on the basket pretty quick. Can’t beat the price and it’s a huge basket always cooks food evenly and very crispy. Go a few minutes past all the recommended times for meat except beef. Moving up to a much more expensive air fryer but this air fryer is a beast.
customer_reviews.author: AMS

customer_reviews.title: Basket does not hold up!
customer_reviews.text: Initially we were impressed with the air fryer. However, now after a month of use, the basket will no longer stay attached to the bottom drawer/pan which means you cannot pull it out of the air fryer without the basket coming out and potentially dumping your food everywhere. The basket and drawer are starting to rust also. And of course, just outside of the 30 day return and warranty window.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Oliveras

customer_reviews.title: Has been great but...
customer_reviews.text: with regular use it crapped out on us almost 2 years later. We used it every day and loved it but coming up on its two year anniversary it will no longer turn on. None of the touch buttons are responsive. Oh well. It was great while it lasted. Will be trying a different brand this time around.
customer_reviews.author: Choo Choo's Mama

customer_reviews.title: Broke with occasional use! Do not recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.text: We had this air fryer for approx. 2 years. It worked well, sort of easy to use. After about a year, the inner basket would fall away from the holder sometimes and spill fries all over the floor. Now we can't get the basket back into the air fryer, and it won't close. There is some sort of defect between the bottom of the basket and the fryer. There is a button that is supposed to be pressed down by the basket which isn't working. Won't buy another one of these and don't recommend this air fryer.
customer_reviews.author: Linloo

customer_reviews.title: Quick and flavorful
customer_reviews.text: My son asked for this item for his birthday - he uses it daily. He lives with us so the whole family has used it. There is a learning curve (at least for me) to decide what temp and for how long, as long as you check your cook and make adjustments and notes for later it will be good. The food has been flavorful and not dried out. Quick and crispy on the outside. It is a little small for our household of 7 - we cook in waves. But for singles or a small family this would be the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia C. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, not great
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I need a little more experience with it before I can say for certain, but as for now, I'm a little disappointed and I used it far less than I thought I would. However, the basket is nice and large on this one and operating it is no problem at all. The recipies I've tried from the cookbook aren't as good as what I've tried on my own, but to be honest, I haven't tried a whole lot from the book. I'll amend this and admit my errors if I discover I'm wrong. On the other hand, my daughter-in-law absolutely loves hers.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy P

customer_reviews.title: No better than a frying pan.
customer_reviews.text: We tried to use it, but found that the design was inadequate. The capacity was small because there is no way to add a 2nd layer, and the cooking was uneven. In the end, I found that our DeLonghi Livenza Electric All-Day Grill was preferable. Far larger capacity and faster.
customer_reviews.author: Pragmatic

customer_reviews.title: My first great air fryer! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is very easy to use and I had used it for soamu dishes now! It definitely worked great for veggies (especially for making yummy kale chips) but ok for meat (I think for juicy BBQ ribs it is still better to take time to bake/roast it). It still stick a lot and takes time to clean so I won't say it is super easy to clean. I know that you can put parchment paper in but it created a very weird sound (likely from the wind and the paper) so I rarely used it.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny Kang

customer_reviews.title: bigger than a breadbox.
customer_reviews.text: I just got it Wednesday and used it once for tater tots. They were great. I did buy the recommended liners. I really just wanted to be sure to mention this is a very (5.8) large extra large gargantuan! I was thinking that it would be the size of a Keurig. You think an appliance that is $80 wouldn't be this large so just be aware of it. the one time I used it for was great. I look forward to learning more about it and trying different recipes and my beloved Buffalo wings.
customer_reviews.author: LEAH

customer_reviews.title: After Using for a Year
customer_reviews.text: I bought my GoWise about a year ago and now the non stick covering in both the pans is peeling. I am very disappointed. I don't use any type of scrubber to remove food that sticks but it still continues to peel. Not sure what that material does to a person if you should eat it.
customer_reviews.author: IbKSgal

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra money and buy a better quality air fryer
customer_reviews.text: I read the mixed reviews of this product before buying. I saw the pictures of the baskets with the inner coating flaking off. Thought to myself, maybe that person just got a bad one. I was wrong. Mine started flaking off too. Just small little specks to start(hard to see in the picture) I never thought it would happen considering I was even using liners every time I used it and washing it with soft cloths. So disappointed. Glad I noticed it on the very last day before it was out of the 30 day return window. Sending it back tomorrow!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Our Fryer Just Stopped Working After 6 Months.
customer_reviews.text: The fryer worked well for six months. It was difficult to use. The icons were confusing and we could never just turn it off to reset it. After a month it just stopped working we put it back on the shelve and revisited it in a week and it started working again. We used it about 20 times over the next 5 months and it stopped working as it did before. This time after letting it sit for a week it still wouldn't turn on. Works fine but very unreliable. We will not buy another Gowise.
customer_reviews.author: DeeQ

customer_reviews.title: Works great and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my brother as a Christmas gift and we tested it on some boneless wings and fries that turned out incredible. Since then, he has used it almost every day and is constantly sending me pictures of all the different things he's made. One of the best features is how easy it is to clean, the tray wipes right off with a sponge. Not having to deal with the cleaning headache, makes this air-fryer a go-to option that isn't avoided due to setup and cleanup time like other fryers I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Scholler

customer_reviews.title: Too legit but then it started chipping 😭
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite products that I’ve bought during this Shelter in Place. I haven’t just made fries but I’ve made them more than anything else. Brussel sprouts, broccoli, chicken wings.. you can do EVERYTHING in an air fryer. Easy to clean easy to operate. We got my dad one too. Get this thing and cook some fries man. Make sure to always toss things halfway through and during your first few cooking sessions check often to see how things are cooking so you don’t over cook. One issues we just had recently on June 6 was the black Teflon started chipping in the basket. Soooo idk what to do about that. My return date just closed May 31
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: The non-stick surface has pealed away
customer_reviews.text: My experience is consistent with others. The non-stick surface peals away after just a few uses and is not covered under the 1 year warranty. Other than that I really enjoyed using this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel S. Valentin

customer_reviews.title: Coating is peeling off
customer_reviews.text: I loved size and the basket shape. Instead of round it is oval and can hold longer food. I love this airfryer so much I even purchased two more for each side of our parents. However, although I used very gentle material to wash with it, the coating from the inside basket is peeling off and I can not find the exact shape replacement. I wish it was made out of stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal K.

customer_reviews.title: Best decision you'll make today!
customer_reviews.text: Stop reading these reviews and put this thing in your cart! I didn't know I needed an air fryer; and now I couldnt live without this thing. This appliance was made for quick snacks and lazy dinners. Its large capacity, and a little bulky- but definitely worth the counter/cabinet space
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great value, good food, worth your time.
customer_reviews.text: I love the air fryer. I made sure to do some research before I bought one. Food does have a slightly different taste due to the lack of oil you’d have in a traditional fryer, but it’s not disgusting. Fries do well, tater tots are amazing. I dislike tater tots due to the grease. I now like tater tots in an air fryer because there’s no grease. GowiseUSA is one of the top brands too. I researched that as well. You can’t go wrong here. Especially when you get it for a discount like I did. $79 for the biggest one on the market? Why yes I think I will.
customer_reviews.author: Prfine

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs an air fryer!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for over six months, we bought it as a gift for ourselves at the holiday. It is a kitchen staple! We cook tons of things with this, our teenagers now make there on frozen foods! The food taste good! We started keto and used it, and bought a keto cookbook which helped us make all kinds of stuff that was healthy in it! It is big enough to cook two large chicken breast in it at the same time! We do have to do batches when I put meat in it. Other things we do not. We are a family of four!!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Kinda frustrating
customer_reviews.text: Ok have had this product several months..basket peeling they sent me a new one... now the button that turns it on has broken. They thought it was the basket so they sent another one..with new basket button fell completely into the unit...now I have to send them the sticker on bottom of unit and cut the cord send that to them and wait and see if they send me another unit! I dont know if this is all airfryer units but this is annoying to me!! Loved it when it worked. Thank God I bought an extended warranty on this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for Christmas. I think she or one of the teenagers have used it ever day. So I bought myself one just like it. I’ve tried lots of different things like hamburgers, chicken breast , thighs, wings, legs, steak, raw shrimp and lots of frozen foods. All turned out good. Cleanup is so easy! Never liked frying hamburgers before because of the greasy cleanup. No mess with the air fryer!
customer_reviews.author: yvi

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and great taste.
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to get a 'fryer' in fear we would fall into the habit of 'frying' everything. However, this is not frying at all, it is a much healthier alternative. The food tastes great and crispy, but no oil needed. We have made several things so far from chicken breasts, pork chops, bacon wrapped jalapeno poppers, chicken nuggets, fish sticks, sweet potato chunks, toasted ravioli, and onion rings. All came out great. I wish we had bought this sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Large capacity- purchase cook book
customer_reviews.text: Yes this Airfryer is super! It’s Big & Roomy! Perfect for families or Parties! The sad side is the cook book is a let down. Not quick food recipes. Which is the main reason I purchased it. Because of that, playing around trying to figure out times & temperature for different foods, got a little hit or miss? But in time I will have it mastered! So, this is highly recommended,but purchase a cook book with it it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Braman

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase all year
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I have made all year ! I am in love with my air fryer !! I never in my life made wings and they came out perfect like from a restaurant first try , even frozen foods came out better than in the oven !! Also love that it came with a cookbook and app with more cooking ideas . Super easy to use , easy to clean and makes food taste so great . Would totally recommend ! From reading many reviews I got the parchment papers for the bottom for each use and have used a soft sponge for cleaning . Amazing product and would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: leo

customer_reviews.title: DOA - Returned
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fryer because of the good reviews. However, I must have received lemon. It would only run for 30 seconds to a minute regardless of the time set. None of the presets worked. So after attempting to use it a couple of frustrating times - I gave up and shipped it back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Rule

customer_reviews.title: Large capacity, no way to turn off the beeps
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Large capacity, pretty easy to program Cons: The silly beeping can't be disabled. So every time you press a button, BEEP! If I'm trying to make something late at night, I end up irking others in the house because of the BEEP! BEEP! BEEP! as I program the thing... I'm tempted to take it apart and drill out the beeper... Also, there's no way to see what's going on inside - no windows. So you kind of have to get used to how long things cook...which means burning some stuff or undercooking it the first few times.
customer_reviews.author: D. S. Greenberg

product_meta.title: GoWISE USA 1700-Watt 5.8-QT 8-in-1 Digital Air Fryer with Recipe Book, Black
product_meta.description: Size:5.8-Qt| Color:BlackThe GoWISE USA air fryer allows you to enjoy your favorite fried snacks and food without the added calories. Rapid air circulation technology cooks food by circulating hot air in all directions, ensuring fast and even cooking. This XL air fryer has 8 built-in smart programs including fries, pork, shrimp, cake, chicken, steak, fish, and pizza. It offers a wide temperature range from 180◦f-400◦f and a cooking timer for up to 30 minutes. Featuring a new built-in alarm function that reminds the user to shake or check their food in 5, 10, and 15 minute increments. Air frying offers a healthier and easier way to cook, and in 30 minutes or less.
feature_bullets: Enjoy your favorite food without the extra calories. This air fryer allows you to fry, bake, grill, and roast with little to no oil. Make crispy fried chicken, steak, French fries, pizza and much more in one countertop appliance

Sleek and modern look with advanced touch screen menu. Take the guesswork out of cooking with the built-in touch screen menu featuring 8 cooking presets: Fries/Chips, Pork, Chicken, Steak, Shrimp, Cake, Fish, and Pizza. Equipped with a wide temperature range from 180Fahrenheit to 400Fahrenheit in 10 degree increments and a cooking timer up to 30 minutes.

Featuring a new Start/Stop button to change time and temperature in the middle of a cook cycle. Don’t forget to shake with the new built-in alarm function that reminds you to shake your ingredients in 5, 10, 15 minute increments.

Comes with non-stick FDA-certified and PFOA free pan and detachable basket equipped with a cool touch handle and button guard to prevent accidental detachment. Shake and flip contents in the middle of your cooking program with the detachable frying basket.
Includes recipe book, This recipe book is filled with 50 recipes specifically made for GoWISE USA Air Fryers. Choose from a variety of meals to make for breakfast, lunch, dinner, or dessert.

Customer obsessed and committed to 100% Satisfaction, all GoWISE USA products come with a 30-day money back Guarantee, 1-year warranty and forever support from gowise customer care. Registered products receive an additional 60 days of Warranty coverage.

Searching for a Gift-This air fryer is the perfect gift under the tree for everyone! Get this multifunctional air fryer for the Moms on the go, dads who love to cook, grandparents or anyone who wants to be healthier. This air fryer allows you to cook your favorite fried foods with little to no oil and without the mess that comes with deep frying

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars10,904 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
